sensitivity: ISO 100 to 6400 in steps of 1/3, 1/2, or 1 EV, plus HI-0.3, HI-0.5, HI-0.7, HI-1, HI-2 (ISO 25600)
whitebalance: Auto (TTL white-balance with main image sensor and 420-pixel RGB sensor), Incandescent, Fluorescent ( 7 types ), Direct Sunlight, Flash, Cloudy, Shade, preset manual
label7: New 10-pin remote terminal, Connector for external microphone
label6: Video output, HDMI output (Type C mini-pin connector)
viewfinder: Eye-level pentaprism; built-in diopter adjustment (-1.7 to +0.7m-1)
label13: Rechargeable Li-ion EN-EL14 battery 1030 mAh, EH-5a AC adapter
autofocus: TTL phase detection, 11 focus points (1 cross-sensor) by Nikon Multi-CAM 1000 autofocus module
label2: SD memory card slot (SDHC and SDXC compliant)
